title: Brand-New Five-Star Beachfront Luxury near Hội An with Decadent Dining
description:
Experience historic beauty and modern opulence at the ultra-luxe Shilla Monogram Quangnam Danang, a brand-new beachfront resort gracefully located on the golden sands between Danang and the beautifully preserved historic town of Hội An. Nestled among swaying palms and perfectly manicured gardens, the brand-new Shilla Monogram is a modern retreat that prides itself on traditional hospitality. Enjoy state-of-the-art facilities, including a tranquil bamboo forest garden, soothing sauna and a lavish infinity pool with endless horizon vistas. Let the warm sea breeze brush your cheeks from the sanctuary of a poolside cabana or treat your body and mind to a rejuvenating floating yoga class. Sink your toes into the soft sands of Ha My Beach or treat your palate to locally sourced cuisine at the resort's sleek restaurant and bistro.

Take a short taxi ride to the nearby UNESCO World Heritage-listed Hội An Old Town and stroll along streets lined with colourful lanterns. Choose a window seat in a quaint cafe and slurp on a famously sweet Vietnamese coffee as you watch traditional wooden boats float peacefully along the river. Find a bargain at the vibrant markets, treat yourself to a tailored suit or watch the lanterns light up historic façades as the sun sets.
